data.title: Solutions for Broadband and Wireless Networks
data.meta_description: PPC Broadband is a leading manufacturer and developer of connectivity solutions for the broadband service provider market.
data.text:
The Sapphire™ Micro Drop Terminal (MDT) is an indoor/outdoor fiber enclosure, designed for last-mile FTTH connections. Smaller than other products with similar functionality and capacity, the MDT supports a wide range of applications for pass-through, direct splicing, pre-terminated, splitting, and other custom options. Designed to exceed IP-67 requirements, the Sapphire MDT provides reliable protection and its mechanical sealing allows quick and easy servicing and re-entry for adding new subscribers.

PPC is the market leader in high-performance connectivity solutions that simplify the installation and maintenance of FTTx networks. PPC has rapidly expanded its product breadth, offering comprehensive solutions for Central Office, Outside Plant and Premises applications for network architectures of all types. Proud of its reputation for technical leadership and craft-friendly innovations, PPC offers customers a true end-to-end solution that meets the needs of any network architecture and topology.

The revolutionary Miniflex® fiber portfolio is designed for single-dwelling unit (SDU), multi-dwelling unit (MDU) or enterprise building applications worldwide and is essential for any FTTx deployment. At the heart of the Miniflex brand is a fiber cable that features grooving technology for incredible flexibility, paired with unmatched kink resistance. Other Miniflex cabling products include QuikPush® cable assemblies, aerial cable, TuffDuct® microduct, and indoor/outdoor microduct.

The Optiscale family of fiber panels and chassis are configured to be used in any high-density fiber management application that requires an initial capacity of 96 PON connections. PPC's Optiscale family of products includes a pivoting panel, internal and external splitter chassis, and a P2P pivoting chassis. Each product has a pivoting design to allow for fast and safe access to the connectivity ports, and allow for easier MACs (Moves, Adds and Changes).
